#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType RoundSummary.

== Name ==

*[CRoundSummary RoundSummary]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--RoundSummary (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
			Stores denormalized score for the round of golf.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===

	<...>  (strokes, points?, putts?, money?, [CPenalty penalties]?, [CStatisticValue statistic]`*`  )</...>

----
    

=== Nested Element Summary ===
        
|| xs:nonNegativeInteger || money ||  					Denormalisation: Total money earned or loss during the round of golf.				 ||
|| [CPenalty golfml:Penalty] || [CPenalty penalties] ||  					Denormalisation: Total number of penalty strokes during the round of golf.				 ||
|| xs:nonNegativeInteger || points ||  					Denormalisation: Total number of points for the round of golf.				 ||
|| xs:nonNegativeInteger || putts ||  					Denormalisation: Total number of putts for the round of golf.				 ||
|| [CStatisticValue golfml:StatisticValue] || [CStatisticValue statistic] ||  					Denormalisation: Statistic for the round of golf.				 ||
|| xs:positiveInteger || strokes ||  					Denormalisation: Total number of strokes for the round of golf.				 ||

===  Local Usage ===

    	[CScorecard Scorecard]
----
    <xs:complexType name="RoundSummary">  <xs:sequence>    <xs:element name="strokes" type="xs:positiveInteger">    </xs:element>    <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="points" type="xs:nonNegativeInteger">    </xs:element>    <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="putts" type="xs:nonNegativeInteger">    </xs:element>    <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="money" type="xs:nonNegativeInteger">    </xs:element>    <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="penalties" type="golfml:Penalty">    </xs:element>    <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="statistic" type="golfml:StatisticValue">    </xs:element>  </xs:sequence></xs:complexType>
----
